args.natural_language_statement: Translate the following and check correctness: Let n>0 be an integer and let a,b ∈ Z. Prove that a ≡ b mod n iff a and b have the same remainder upon division by n. Save it to: srdoty_alg_Z_n_779.lean

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Function

/-- Let n>0 be an integer and let a,b ∈ Z. Prove that a ≡ b mod n iff a and b have the same remainder upon division by n. -/
theorem modEq_iff_mod_eq_tac_26040 (n : ℤ) (hn : 0 < n) (a : ℤ) (b : ℤ) : a ≡ b [ZMOD n] ↔ a % n = b % n := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Let n>0 be an integer and let a,b ∈ Z. Prove that a ≡ b mod n iff a and b have the same remainder upon division by n. -/
theorem modEq_iff_mod_eq_tac_26040 (n : ℤ) (hn : 0 < n) (a : ℤ) (b : ℤ) : a ≡ b [ZMOD n] ↔ a % n = b % n := by sorry
